page.title: 15A School-girl's Diary (2)
page.content:
At twelve o'clock or half past twelve we go for our dinner. Then we have a playtime till quarter past one. Then we go into the classroom and work for three quarters of an hour. Our next playtime is at two thirty till two forty five.Then we work and at three forty-five we go home. When I get in I have my tea.Sometimes I go out to the Recreation Centre or the Leisure Pool for the evening. I also enjoy walking with my friends or riding my bike. I watch the television some time in the evening as I have several favourite programmes, but at nine o'clock I go to bed.
Vicky Williams (age 11)
